description:
This is a market on whether a team from China will win the 2021 League of Legends World Championship. The competition runs from October 11, 2021, to November 6, 2021, and you can find more information on its process at this address : https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/World_Championship/2021
The Chinese teams qualified for the event are currently Edward Gaming, FunPlus Phoenix, Royal Never Give Up and LNG Esports, although the latter starts from the play-in stage.
If a Chinese team wins the 2021 League of Legends World Championship, the market will resolve “Yes”. Otherwise, the market will resolve “No”. If the finals are postponed to a date on or before November 30, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the group stage is postponed to a date after November 30, 2021, or canceled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50.
